justification: "Participants completed two tasks in this study: two blocks of the Spot-The-Differences task (SPOT) to measure cheating behavior…"

measured_by: level of cheating in the first block of the Spot-The-Differences Task
justification: "An individual's level of cheating in the first block of the SPOT is taken as a measure of the participant's moral default."

The study uses "the Maastricht Acute Stress Test (MAST), a well-established stress induction task," which "has been found to reliably induce elevated cortisol levels and subjective ratings of stress."
